scripts.pages:build: opennextjs-cloudflare build && rm -rf .open-next/pages && mkdir -p .open-next/pages && cp -R .open-next/assets/. .open-next/pages/ && cp -R .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/pages/cloudflare && cp -R .open-next/middleware .open-next/pages/middleware && cp -R .open-next/server-functions .open-next/pages/server-functions && cp -R .open-next/.build .open-next/pages/.build && cp -R .open-next/cache .open-next/pages/cache && cp -R .open-next/dynamodb-provider .open-next/pages/dynamodb-provider && cp -R .open-next/cloudflare-templates .open-next/pages/cloudflare-templates && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/pages/opennext-worker.js && node scripts/write-pages-worker.mjs
